ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They will confront each other, questioning one another.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And some of them will confront the others,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They will then turn towards each other (and start wrangling).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will turn to each other saying,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And some of them inclined towards others, mutually questioning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And they will turn to one another and question one another.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And some of them shall advance towards others, questioning each other.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and advance one upon another, asking each other questions.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And some of them draw near unto others, mutually questioning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They will turn upon one another, and question one another.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they will advance toward each other mutually questioning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Some of them will turn to others, questioning each other.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And they will turn to one another, and question one another.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And they will turn to one another and question one another.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and approach each other with questions,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They will come to one another, questioning one another.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they will approach one another blaming each other.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:27] And some of them will turn to others, questioning each other, blaming one another and disputing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And some of them draw near unto others) the humans go to the satans and the lowly among people go to the leaders, (mutually questioning) reproaching one another and arguing.
